install(FILES ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/boost/lib/libboost_thread.so DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/lidar)
install(FILES ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/boost/lib/libboost_thread.so.1 DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/lidar)
install(FILES ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/boost/lib/libboost_thread.so.1.71 DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/lidar)
install(FILES ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/boost/lib/libboost_thread.so.1.71.0 DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/lidar)

install(FILES ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/openssl/lib/libcrypto.so DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/lidar)
install(FILES ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/openssl/lib/libcrypto.so.3 DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/lidar)
install(FILES ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/openssl/lib/libssl.so DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/lidar)
install(FILES ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/openssl/lib/libssl.so.3 DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/lidar)

install(FILES ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/pcap/lib/libpcap.so DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/lidar)
install(FILES ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/pcap/lib/libpcap.so.1 DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/lidar)
install(FILES ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/pcap/lib/libpcap.so.1.10.1 DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/lidar)
